Hello github.io

Hello World! from my static jekyll powered website

Writing a static website

In case you want to write a static website here are some links to get started. You would have a dozen static templating engines which you can choose from however, the most convenient ones are:-

  • Jekyll

  • Hyde

Jekyll natively works with github pages so that would work best unless you have your own hosting infrastructure. In case you are using hyde you can proceed as follows

  • Get hyde and use a starter template to get started, If you like bootstrap you can borrow Jeremy’s template You can find it here Jeremy’s Hyde Template
  • Start reading source code of some sites powered by hyde sites
  • You might need to refer to some jinja documentation for information on templating jinja
